text:
As I'm using JSP for (X)HTML pages I have trouble with the fact that the output
to the browser is not really nice, it doesn't follow any layout rule that exist
for XML. If there is anything where I can help with this, I have experience with
XML and Regexp, so I am able to make an engine for this. Please let me know.
creator: svanleent@wanadoo.nl
remm@apache.org
text: Please post to tomcat-dev. BZ shouldn't be used for throwing random ideas around.

creator: kin-man.chung@sun.com
text:
Can you elaborate on your statement "the output to the borwser is not really
nice, it doesn't follow any layout rule that exist for XML"?  Maybe you can give
an example?

Please note that the output for a JSP page in xml syntax is governed by the JSP
spec.  If you think this is a spec related issue please direct your comments to
jsr-152-comments@jcp.org.  Thanks.
